p: In this study, genes shown as differentially expressed between F5 and F1 follicles by RNA-seq analyses were also subjected to quantitative RT-PCR (qRT-PCR) analyses. In F5 follicles, the genes include RPL4, RPS6, CYP11A1, NGFR, PTGER3, WNT6, AMH, NBL1, FMOD, Id1. In F1 follicles, the genes include CYP11a1, STAR, NPC2, NGFR, PTGER3, FSHR, WNT4, WNT6, AMH, ZP2, ZP3, NBL1, FOMD, Id1. As shown in Fig S2, these genes showed similar differential expression profiles between the two assays, thus supporting the reliability of the results.
